result.reason: Allows users to distinguish between connections that were active and disconnected versus those never attempted, aiding in identifying dropped sessions.
result.approach: Add a runtime 'HasBeenConnected' property to ConnectionInfo. Update connection logic to set this flag on successful connect. Update the connection tree renderer to display a distinct icon or overlay for nodes where HasBeenConnected is true but IsConnected is false.
